Recommendations: 1. Involve all groups of stakeholders in the formulation of the research agenda by inviting term during planning and in-house reviews. Establish linkages for resource sharing and pother collaborative activities.
2. Hire additional support personnel to enhance the research capability of the unit.
3. Explore means in generating more income from research outputs.
4. Revive the publication of the College's research/technical journal. Create a committee to handle this activity and allocate funds for this purpose.
5. Upgrading laboratory facility should be intensified to be able to conduct basic and high-end activities.
6. Give due importance to external linkaging and recourse generation activities.
